item.title: Gadwal royal family celebrates Eruvaka Festival, honours farming traditions
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal royal family celebrates Eruvaka Festival, honours farming traditions
The Eruvaka Festival, marking the monsoon’s arrival, was celebrated across Telugu states with rituals led by Gadwal royal descendant Krishna Ram Bhupal. Farmers decorated tools and cattle, expressing gratitude to rain gods while embracing traditional agricultural customs.
By T Ivan Nischal Published Date - 12 June 2025, 01:33 PM
Gadwal: The traditional Eruvaka Festival, which marks the onset of the monsoon and celebra...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today, T Ivan Nischal

item.title: False cases against farmers: Rajoli SI attached to SP office, enquiry under progress
item.description:
<![CDATA[False cases against farmers: Rajoli SI attached to SP office, enquiry under progress
Rajoli Sub-Inspector D Jagadeeshwar was attached to the SP’s office and is under departmental enquiry after farmers alleged he filed false cases and assaulted them during protests against an ethanol plant in Pedda Dhanwada village in Gadwal district.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 12 June 2025, 12:19 PM
Rajoli Sub-Inspector D Jagadeeshwar was attached to the SP’s office and is under departmental enquiry ...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
